item.title: Local Warming | Visualising Temperature Increase In Barbados
item.description: Barbados is hot! It’s a tropical paradise in the Caribbean it was always hot but these days, thanks to global warming, it is hotter than ever before. Exactly how hot is it? The devil went to hell to escape the heat in Barbados — You cant hear Jimmy (@CorinBailey) July 25, 2018 That sums it up perfectly, the question isn’t if Barbados is getting warmer, that’s a definite.
